Class EntrantAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.example.ajilore.code.adapters.EntrantAdapter.EntrantViewHolder>
com.example.ajilore.code.adapters.EntrantAdapter
public class EntrantAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.example.ajilore.code.adapters.EntrantAdapter.EntrantViewHolder>
RecyclerView adapter used to display entrant information for different organizer views (Invited, Cancelled, Enrolled).

This adapter supports:

  • Dynamic row displays based on the list type (invited, cancelled, enrolled).
  • Showing entrant name, email, status, date, and cancellation reason (when relevant).
  • Callback handling via EntrantAdapter.OnEntrantClickListener for row tap actions.

Used by:

  • InvitedEntrantsFragment
  • CancelledEntrantsFragment
  • EnrolledEntrantsFragment
